name: SACRIFICE LAB
description:
in this game you SACRIFICE Boxes

Fire Art by sanctumpixel : Fire Column Pixel Art Effect by sanctumpixel (itch.io)

tutorial Music by federico aldinucci:Free Music - No copyright music- Background Music - Instrumental - - YouTube

Mouse: to Move

E: to pick up/ put down Boxes

R: to Reset

and also go into fullscreen mode
